stories.text:
Hey everyone,

I'm the founder of Blobr.io - a tool to create your branded API portal.

Super excited to share it today with you and launching it on Product Hunt. There is a free plan with 100k calls to start using it.

With Blobr, you can display your APIs like products and manage access. You can filter content, monitor usage and monetize your APIs. It Simplifies the API onboarding process for your users and let them see their real-time consumption.

Feel free to leave a HN comment or vote for us on Product hunt. Would love to get your feedback. https://www.producthunt.com/posts/blobr

Thanks, Alexandre
